long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is for PMMVY operator, It take data from excel and fill on website
Auto filling form of PMMVY website, it take data from excel sheet and put into PMMVY website for, it makes easy to submit form



Application supports the following browsers: Chrome (latest)
